column5: hey everyone! im new to the forum and like to say hi to everyone!i got out fishing atleast once a week and i admit im addicted! as soon as i figure out how to resize my pics i'll post some highlights of my season and will have more to come after next weekend when i go towards chapleau for a 3day trip for big northerns. im from the sault and if your from around here or passing through and wanna go fishing let me know!
Welcome abord Slayer you will find your stay a very good one.
Welcome. A lot of members use photobucket to host/post photos so that you don't have to resize them. I can use it, but I'm not the one to explain how to.  http://photobucket.com/
Hmmmm....from Northern Ontario AND you like pike fishing?      I dunno...sounds suspicious....just kidding!    Welcome aboard and thanks for the nice intro!
Hi and welcome to OFC pike slayer  Lots of great folks on this site.... you're gonna love it here Leechman

thanks for all the welcomes so far! haha pike fishing is my favorite fish to target, they are large, reasonably easy to catch,and they put up an amazing fight. i also go for smallies, specks, bows, walleyes, lakers, etc.
welcome aboard! im sure you will enjoy yourself with this message board!   Hawk
Welcome aboard Pikeslayer, nice to have another Northerner in here, we seem to be a rare breed on here....
Welcome to the Community Pike Slayer.  Here is link with some helpful info on posting pictures.  Pictures  If you need further assistance, feel free to PM me
Hey Pike er may we call you Pike? there are a few more here from the area and will be glad to hear your stories.
